name: gh-pages
description: example of showing 1. script entry point 2. extracted scss files and 3. server rendering using reacthtmlpack

scripts.build: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production reacthtmlpack buildToDir ../../public ./scripts/*.html.js
scripts.dev: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=development reacthtmlpack buildToDir ../../public ./scripts/*.html.js
scripts.start: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=development reacthtmlpack devServer ./Client.webpackConfig.js ../../public ./scripts/*.html.js
